long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Magic Square Puzzle is an engaging and brain-teasing game that brings the classic mathematical puzzle to your browser. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts, math lovers, and anyone looking to give their mind a quick workout!
How to play:

Fill the 3x3 grid with numbers from 1 to 9.
Use each number exactly once.
Make sure every row, column, and diagonal adds up to 15.

Features:

Clean and intuitive interface
Quick to play during short breaks
Helps improve logical thinking and arithmetic skills
Suitable for all ages, from kids to adults
No time limit - solve at your own pace
Check your solution with a single click
Reset the game anytime to start over

Whether you're a seasoned puzzle solver or new to Magic Squares, this extension offers a fun and challenging experience. Train your brain, improve your problem-solving skills, and enjoy the satisfaction of completing this classic mathematical puzzle!
Download Magic Square Puzzle now and start your journey into the fascinating world of numerical patterns and logical thinking!
